dhp236:4: Dibbaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ upehisi → dibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisi (bj, s1-3, pts1-2) | dibbamariyabhūmiṃ upehisi (?)
dhp238:4: Na punaṃ jātijaraṃ → na puna jātijaraṃ (bj, s1-3) | na puna jātijjaraṃ (mr)
dhp249:3: Tattha yo ca maṅku bhavati → tattha ce maṃku yo hoti (bj) | tattha yo maṅkuto hoti (s1-3) | tattha yo maṅku hoti (pts1) | tattha yo maṅku bhavati (pts2)
